alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Fillmore; Houston; Mower; Olmsted (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 22 at 5:24PM CST until January 23 at 3:00AM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Snow Moving In... .Snow was moving the area and will continue to spread across the advisory area early this evening. Expect the snow to continue for most of the evening before ending late this evening or very early Sunday morning. Snowfall rates of an inch an hour will be possible helping to create total accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. Be ready for slippery winter travel through the night time hours. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM CST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. * WHERE...Portions of southwest Wisconsin, north central and northeast Iowa and southeast Minnesota. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 3 AM CST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, check 511ia.org in Iowa, 511mn.org in Minnesota, and 511wi.gov in Wisconsin.
